Privacy Policy for Islamic Wallpaper App

Last Updated: [23/11/2023]

1. Introduction:

Welcome to Islamic Wallpaper, your go-to application for a diverse collection of Islamic wallpapers. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our app. By downloading and using Islamic Wallpaper, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

2. Information We Collect:

a. Personal Information:

When you download the app, we may collect information such as your device model, operating system, and unique device identifiers.
b. Usage Information:

We collect data on how you use the app, including the wallpapers you view, download, and share. This information helps us improve our services and enhance user experience.
3. How We Use Your Information:

a. Providing and Improving the App:

We use the collected information to deliver the features of the app, optimize performance, and enhance the overall user experience.
b. Communication:

We may use your contact information to send you updates, notifications, and relevant information about the app. You can opt-out of these communications at any time.
c. Aggregated Data:

We may use aggregated and anonymized data for analytical and statistical purposes to understand user preferences and improve our services.
4. Information Sharing:

a. Third-Party Services:

We may use third-party services to analyze app usage and enhance functionality. These services are bound by their own privacy policies, and we recommend reviewing them for a complete understanding.
b. Legal Compliance:

We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights and interests.
5. Data Security:

a. Secure Storage:

We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. This includes secure data storage and encryption.
6. Your Choices:

a. Opt-Out:

You have the option to opt-out of certain communications. You can manage your communication preferences within the app settings.
b. Access and Correction:

You can access and correct your personal information by contacting us through the app.
7. Updates to Privacy Policy:

a. Notification:

We will notify you of any changes to this Privacy Policy by updating the "Last Updated" date. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically.
8. Contact Us:

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [arqam.appdev@gmail.com].

By using the Islamic Wallpaper app, you signify your acceptance of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use the app.
